name: Patrick Wilson
description:
'''Patrick George Wilson''' (born February 1, 1969) is an American musician, singer and songwriter. He is best known as a co-founding member and the drummer of the [[Rock music|rock]] band [[Weezer]], with whom he has recorded 15 studio albums.

In addition to his work with Weezer, Wilson also fronts his own band, [[the Special Goodness]].
